aka: Hells OG, Hell’s OG, Hells Angel OG, Hells Angels OG, Hell’s Angels OG, Biker Kush
description: Hell's OG (formerly known as Hell's Angels OG or just Biker's Kush) is an indica-dominant hybrid that is said to contain OG Kush and Blackberry genetics. The strain’s origins are poorly documented, but popular myth will tell you Hell's OG was bred by biker ruffians in Southern California. If nothing else, we could assume this strain is named after its fierce psychoactive effects that settle in quickly and heavily. Lifting stress from the mind and pain from the body, Hell's OG is a therapeutic strain commonly used to treat inflammation, insomnia, and PTSD. Underneath its dominant earthy flavors hides a subtle citrus, candy-like aroma. This hybrid produces large, heavy buds that flower in 8 to 9 weeks indoors while outdoor plants are ready for harvest during the September-October transition.
descriptionPlain: Hell's OG (formerly known as Hell's Angels OG or just Biker's Kush) is an indica-dominant hybrid that is said to contain OG Kush and Blackberry genetics. The strain’s origins are poorly documented, but popular myth will tell you Hell's OG was bred by biker ruffians in Southern California. If nothing else, we could assume this strain is named after its fierce psychoactive effects that settle in quickly and heavily. Lifting stress from the mind and pain from the body, Hell's OG is a therapeutic strain commonly used to treat inflammation, insomnia, and PTSD. Underneath its dominant earthy flavors hides a subtle citrus, candy-like aroma. This hybrid produces large, heavy buds that flower in 8 to 9 weeks indoors while outdoor plants are ready for harvest during the September-October transition.

highlightedReviews.text: This is my favorite sleepy time strain. Do NOT read that to mean it is ONLY good for sleeping. I enjoy it pretty much any time. But it turns my brain off and lets me relax. Let me explain that a little better...it turns off the constantly thinking, logical part of my brain (frontal lobe?) that keeps me awake all night because it won't shut the f up, and activates the creative parts of my brain (temporal lobes?) so I can go into receive mode and sit back and let my mind drift. To say I have trouble falling asleep is putting it mildly. On top of that, once I DO fall asleep, I usually wake up a couple hours later and can't get BACK to sleep making consistent, quality sleep very rare. And I refuse to take sleeping pills. This strain completely alleviates both types of insomnia for me. Yet it doesn't MAKE me fall asleep when I smoke it during the day. I vape almost exclusively (and hash oil, but I digress) and this strain is amazing for vaping. No worries of anxiety or paranoia. Great flavor. Does the job. I would buy this by the POUND! Is it weird I feel worried that I only have 2 ounces left? LOL!

wonderful flower,  taste is sweet and earthy. i would burn this and watch a comedy movie, goes great with the effects. also great for joint , back, and neck pain , has a good % c-mycene which is a natural acting pain reliever
